subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula to calculate Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
question_hi: ग्रॉस दूसरों के पैसा (GDP) को कैसे प्रतिशत करें।
explanation_en:
The correct formula to calculate Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is GDP = C + I + (X - M), also known as the expenditure approach.
In this formula, GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a given period (usually a year), C represents consumption expenditure, I represents investment expenditure, X represents exports, and M represents imports.
